metadata.description:
83 pages!
In Deeproot, West Virginia, monsters, lost gods, and underground, would-be-conquerors find an ideal home to plot various their nefarious schemes. However, Woody, a ten-year old detective, and the Noble, his partner, protector, dog just moved to the very same little town. In short-order, it's the monsters that suddenly find themselves being hunted by the unusual duo! A twisted children's tale, for adults.
metadata.name: Woody and the Noble
